title: PDLT2214MB - LIMITED EDITION - MAPA BURL TO BLACK BURST LACQUER - 4-PIECE KIT
mainDescription: This PDP Concept Series LTD Mapa Burl 4-Piece Shell Pack features 100% European maple shells and figured mapa burl veneers to deliver an experience that’s easy on the ears and the eyes. These 7-ply shells produce the classic warm tones and resonance of maple with mid to low-end attack.
titleMainAsset: Limited Edition2023 LIMITED EDITION MAPA BURL TO BLACK BURST LACQUER SNARE
assetMainDescription: This limited production snare has a striking black burst finish and is available in 5.5” x 14”..The antique bronze hardware features stylish dual-turret lugs and high-end DW appointments like a MAG Throw-off™, True-Pitch Tuning™ rods, and Remo heads.
